resources.string: Please enter a recipe or an ingredient, then click the \'Search\' button to view results.
This is where you can view recipes after you have clicked the \'Save Recipe\' button on any recipe.
Please click on any recipe from the list to view details.

This is where you can see the ingredients and the URL of the recipe you selected. Recipes can be saved by clicking the \'Save Recipe\' button. The URL can be clicked to open the website. Click the \'Back to Search\' button to search for something else.
